definitions.definition: Containing sufficient poison to be dangerous to touch or ingest .
examples: While highly poisonous to dogs, this substance is completely harmless if ingested by humans.

definitions.definition: Of an animal such as a snake or spider , or parts of its body : producing a toxin intended for defensive or offensive use which is usually injected into an enemy or prey by biting or stinging ; hence, of a bite or sting : injecting poison.
examples: Poisonous snakes should only be handled by experienced professionals.

main_definition: Containing sufficient poison to be dangerous to touch or ingest .
secondary_definitions: Of an animal such as a snake or spider , or parts of its body : producing a toxin intended for defensive or offensive use which is usually injected into an enemy or prey by biting or stinging ; hence, of a bite or sting : injecting poison.
